00099 int
00100 Cudd_zddPrintMinterm(
00101   DdManager * zdd,
00102   DdNode * node)
00103 {
00104     int         i, size;
00105     int         *list;
00106 
00107     size = (int)zdd->sizeZ;
00108     list = ALLOC(int, size);
00109     if (list == NULL) {
00110         zdd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00111         return(0);
00112     }
00113     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) list[i] = 3; /* bogus value should disappear */
00114     zdd_print_minterm_aux(zdd, node, 0, list);
00115     FREE(list);
00116     return(1);
00117 
00118 } /* end of Cudd_zddPrintMinterm */

00144 int
00145 Cudd_zddPrintDebug(
00146   DdManager * zdd,
00147   DdNode * f,
00148   int  n,
00149   int  pr)
00150 {
00151     DdNode      *empty = DD_ZERO(zdd);
00152     int         nodes;
00153     double      minterms;
00154     int         retval = 1;
00155 
00156     if (f == empty && pr > 0) {
00157         (void) fprintf(stdout,": is the empty ZDD\n");
00158         (void) fflush(stdout);
00159         return(1);
00160     }
00161 
00162     if (pr > 0) {
00163         nodes = Cudd_zddDagSize(f);
00164         if (nodes == CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) retval = 0;
00165         minterms = Cudd_zddCountMinterm(zdd, f, n);
00166         if (minterms == (double)CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) retval = 0;
00167         (void) fprintf(stdout,": %d nodes %g minterms\n", nodes, minterms);
00168         if (pr > 2)
00169             if (!cuddZddP(zdd, f)) retval = 0;
00170         if (pr == 2 || pr > 3) {
00171             if (!Cudd_zddPrintMinterm(zdd, f)) retval = 0;
00172             (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00173         }
00174         (void) fflush(stdout);
00175     }
00176     return(retval);
00177 
00178 } /* end of Cudd_zddPrintDebug */

00208 int
00209 Cudd_zddDumpDot(
00210   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00211   int  n /* number of output nodes to be dumped */,
00212   DdNode ** f /* array of output nodes to be dumped */,
00213   char ** inames /* array of input names (or NULL) */,
00214   char ** onames /* array of output names (or NULL) */,
00215   FILE * fp /* pointer to the dump file */)
00216 {
00217     DdNode      *support = NULL;
00218     DdNode      *scan;
00219     int         *sorted = NULL;
00220     int         nvars = dd->sizeZ;
00221     st_table    *visited = NULL;
00222     st_generator *gen;
00223     int         retval;
00224     int         i, j;
00225     int         slots;
00226 #ifdef __osf__
00227 #pragma pointer_size save
00228 #pragma pointer_size short
00229 #endif
00230     DdNode      **nodelist;
00231 #ifdef __osf__
00232 #pragma pointer_size restore
00233 #endif
00234     long        refAddr, diff, mask;
00235 
00236     /* Build a bit array with the support of f. */
00237     sorted = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00238     if (sorted == NULL) {
00239         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00240         goto failure;
00241     }
00242     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) sorted[i] = 0;
00243 
00244     /* Take the union of the supports of each output function. */
00245     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00246         support = Cudd_Support(dd,f[i]);
00247         if (support == NULL) goto failure;
00248         cuddRef(support);
00249         scan = support;
00250         while (!cuddIsConstant(scan)) {
00251             sorted[scan->index] = 1;
00252             scan = cuddT(scan);
00253         }
00254         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00255     }
00256     support = NULL; /* so that we do not try to free it in case of failure */
00257 
00258     /* Initialize symbol table for visited nodes. */
00259     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00260     if (visited == NULL) goto failure;
00261 
00262     /* Collect all the nodes of this DD in the symbol table. */
00263     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00264         retval = cuddCollectNodes(f[i],visited);
00265         if (retval == 0) goto failure;
00266     }
00267 
00268     /* Find how many most significant hex digits are identical
00269     ** in the addresses of all the nodes. Build a mask based
00270     ** on this knowledge, so that digits that carry no information
00271     ** will not be printed. This is done in two steps.
00272     **  1. We scan the symbol table to find the bits that differ
00273     **     in at least 2 addresses.
00274     **  2. We choose one of the possible masks. There are 8 possible
00275     **     masks for 32-bit integer, and 16 possible masks for 64-bit
00276     **     integers.
00277     */
00278 
00279     /* Find the bits that are different. */
00280     refAddr = (long) f[0];
00281     diff = 0;
00282     gen = st_init_gen(visited);
00283     while (st_gen(gen, (char **) &scan, NULL)) {
00284         diff |= refAddr ^ (long) scan;
00285     }
00286     st_free_gen(gen);
00287 
00288     /* Choose the mask. */
00289     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < 8 * sizeof(long); i += 4) {
00290         mask = (1 << i) - 1;
00291         if (diff <= mask) break;
00292     }
00293 
00294     /* Write the header and the global attributes. */
00295     retval = fprintf(fp,"digraph \"ZDD\" {\n");
00296     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00297     retval = fprintf(fp,
00298         "size = \"7.5,10\"\ncenter = true;\nedge [dir = none];\n");
00299     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00300 
00301     /* Write the input name subgraph by scanning the support array. */
00302     retval = fprintf(fp,"{ node [shape = plaintext];\n");
00303     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00304     retval = fprintf(fp,"  edge [style = invis];\n");
00305     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00306     /* We use a name ("CONST NODES") with an embedded blank, because
00307     ** it is unlikely to appear as an input name.
00308     */
00309     retval = fprintf(fp,"  \"CONST NODES\" [style = invis];\n");
00310     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00311     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00312         if (sorted[dd->invpermZ[i]]) {
00313             if (inames == NULL) {
00314                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %d \" -> ", dd->invpermZ[i]);
00315             } else {
00316                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %s \" -> ", inames[dd->invpermZ[i]]);
00317             }
00318             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00319         }
00320     }
00321     retval = fprintf(fp,"\"CONST NODES\"; \n}\n");
00322     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00323 
00324     /* Write the output node subgraph. */
00325     retval = fprintf(fp,"{ rank = same; node [shape = box]; edge [style = invis];\n");
00326     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00327     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00328         if (onames == NULL) {
00329             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"F%d\"", i);
00330         } else {
00331             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"  %s  \"", onames[i]);
00332         }
00333         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00334         if (i == n - 1) {
00335             retval = fprintf(fp,"; }\n");
00336         } else {
00337             retval = fprintf(fp," -> ");
00338         }
00339         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00340     }
00341 
00342     /* Write rank info: All nodes with the same index have the same rank. */
00343     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00344         if (sorted[dd->invpermZ[i]]) {
00345             retval = fprintf(fp,"{ rank = same; ");
00346             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00347             if (inames == NULL) {
00348                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %d \";\n", dd->invpermZ[i]);
00349             } else {
00350                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\" %s \";\n", inames[dd->invpermZ[i]]);
00351             }
00352             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00353             nodelist = dd->subtableZ[i].nodelist;
00354             slots = dd->subtableZ[i].slots;
00355             for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00356                 scan = nodelist[j];
00357                 while (scan != NULL) {
00358                     if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00359                         retval = fprintf(fp,"\"%lx\";\n", (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode));
00360                         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00361                     }
00362                     scan = scan->next;
00363                 }
00364             }
00365             retval = fprintf(fp,"}\n");
00366             if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00367         }
00368     }
00369 
00370     /* All constants have the same rank. */
00371     retval = fprintf(fp,
00372         "{ rank = same; \"CONST NODES\";\n{ node [shape = box]; ");
00373     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00374     nodelist = dd->constants.nodelist;
00375     slots = dd->constants.slots;
00376     for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00377         scan = nodelist[j];
00378         while (scan != NULL) {
00379             if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00380                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\"%lx\";\n", (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode));
00381                 if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00382             }
00383             scan = scan->next;
00384         }
00385     }
00386     retval = fprintf(fp,"}\n}\n");
00387     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00388 
00389     /* Write edge info. */
00390     /* Edges from the output nodes. */
00391     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00392         if (onames == NULL) {
00393             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"F%d\"", i);
00394         } else {
00395             retval = fprintf(fp,"\"  %s  \"", onames[i]);
00396         }
00397         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00398         retval = fprintf(fp," -> \"%lx\" [style = solid];\n",
00399                          (mask & (long) f[i]) / sizeof(DdNode));
00400         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00401     }
00402 
00403     /* Edges from internal nodes. */
00404     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00405         if (sorted[dd->invpermZ[i]]) {
00406             nodelist = dd->subtableZ[i].nodelist;
00407             slots = dd->subtableZ[i].slots;
00408             for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00409                 scan = nodelist[j];
00410                 while (scan != NULL) {
00411                     if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00412                         retval = fprintf(fp,
00413                             "\"%lx\" -> \"%lx\";\n",
00414                             (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode),
00415                             (mask & (long) cuddT(scan)) / sizeof(DdNode));
00416                         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00417                         retval = fprintf(fp,
00418                                          "\"%lx\" -> \"%lx\" [style = dashed];\n",
00419                                          (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode),
00420                                          (mask & (long) cuddE(scan)) / sizeof(DdNode));
00421                         if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00422                     }
00423                     scan = scan->next;
00424                 }
00425             }
00426         }
00427     }
00428 
00429     /* Write constant labels. */
00430     nodelist = dd->constants.nodelist;
00431     slots = dd->constants.slots;
00432     for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00433         scan = nodelist[j];
00434         while (scan != NULL) {
00435             if (st_is_member(visited,(char *) scan)) {
00436                 retval = fprintf(fp,"\"%lx\" [label = \"%g\"];\n",
00437                     (mask & (long) scan) / sizeof(DdNode), cuddV(scan));
00438                 if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00439             }
00440             scan = scan->next;
00441         }
00442     }
00443 
00444     /* Write trailer and return. */
00445     retval = fprintf(fp,"}\n");
00446     if (retval == EOF) goto failure;
00447 
00448     st_free_table(visited);
00449     FREE(sorted);
00450     return(1);
00451 
00452 failure:
00453     if (sorted != NULL) FREE(sorted);
00454     if (support != NULL) Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,support);
00455     if (visited != NULL) st_free_table(visited);
00456     return(0);
00457 
00458 } /* end of Cudd_zddDumpBlif */

00479 int
00480 cuddZddP(
00481   DdManager * zdd,
00482   DdNode * f)
00483 {
00484     int retval;
00485     st_table *table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00486 
00487     if (table == NULL) return(0);
00488 
00489     retval = zp2(zdd, f, table);
00490     st_free_table(table);
00491     (void) fputc('\n', stdout);
00492     return(retval);
00493 
00494 } /* end of cuddZddP */

00501 
00514 static int
00515 zp2(
00516   DdManager * zdd,
00517   DdNode * f,
00518   st_table * t)
00519 {
00520     DdNode      *n;
00521     int         T, E;
00522     DdNode      *base = DD_ONE(zdd);
00523     
00524     if (f == NULL)
00525         return(0);
00526 
00527     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) {
00528         (void)fprintf(stdout, "ID = %d\n", (f == base));
00529         return(1);
00530     }
00531     if (st_is_member(t, (char *)f) == 1)
00532         return(1);
00533 
00534     if (st_insert(t, (char *) f, NULL) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM)
00535         return(0);
00536 
00537 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00538     (void) fprintf(stdout, "ID = 0x%lx\tindex = %d\tr = %d\t",
00539         (unsigned long)f / (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode), f->index, f->ref);
00540 #else
00541     (void) fprintf(stdout, "ID = 0x%x\tindex = %d\tr = %d\t",
00542         (unsigned)f / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode), f->index, f->ref);
00543 #endif
00544 
00545     n = cuddT(f);
00546     if (Cudd_IsConstant(n)) {
00547         (void) fprintf(stdout, "T = %d\t\t", (n == base));
00548         T = 1;
00549     } else {
00550 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00551         (void) fprintf(stdout, "T = 0x%lx\t", (unsigned long) n /
00552                        (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00553 #else
00554         (void) fprintf(stdout, "T = 0x%x\t", (unsigned) n / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00555 #endif
00556         T = 0;
00557     }
00558 
00559     n = cuddE(f);
00560     if (Cudd_IsConstant(n)) {
00561         (void) fprintf(stdout, "E = %d\n", (n == base));
00562         E = 1;
00563     } else {
00564 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00565         (void) fprintf(stdout, "E = 0x%lx\n", (unsigned long) n /
00566                       (unsigned long) sizeof(DdNode));
00567 #else
00568         (void) fprintf(stdout, "E = 0x%x\n", (unsigned) n / (unsigned) sizeof(DdNode));
00569 #endif
00570         E = 0;
00571     }
00572 
00573     if (E == 0)
00574         if (zp2(zdd, cuddE(f), t) == 0) return(0);
00575     if (T == 0)
00576         if (zp2(zdd, cuddT(f), t) == 0) return(0);
00577     return(1);
00578 
00579 } /* end of zp2 */

00581 
00593 static void
00594 zdd_print_minterm_aux(
00595   DdManager * zdd /* manager */,
00596   DdNode * node /* current node */,
00597   int  level /* depth in the recursion */,
00598   int * list /* current recursion path */)
00599 {
00600     DdNode      *Nv, *Nnv;
00601     int         i, v;
00602     DdNode      *base = DD_ONE(zdd);
00603 
00604     if (Cudd_IsConstant(node)) {
00605         if (node == base) {
00606             /* Check for missing variable. */
00607             if (level != zdd->sizeZ) {
00608                 list[zdd->invpermZ[level]] = 0;
00609                 zdd_print_minterm_aux(zdd, node, level + 1, list);
00610                 return;
00611             }
00612             /* Terminal case: Print one cube based on the current recursion
00613             ** path.
00614             */
00615             for (i = 0; i < zdd->sizeZ; i++) {
00616                 v = list[i];
00617                 if (v == 0)
00618                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"0");
00619                 else if (v == 1)
00620                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"1");
00621                 else if (v == 3)
00622                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"@"); /* should never happen */
00623                 else
00624                     (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00625             }
00626             (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00627         }
00628     } else {
00629         /* Check for missing variable. */
00630         if (level != cuddIZ(zdd,node->index)) {
00631             list[zdd->invpermZ[level]] = 0;
00632             zdd_print_minterm_aux(zdd, node, level + 1, list);
00633             return;
00634         }
00635 
00636         Nnv = cuddE(node);
00637         Nv = cuddT(node);
00638         if (Nv == Nnv) {
00639             list[node->index] = 2;
00640             zdd_print_minterm_aux(zdd, Nnv, level + 1, list);
00641             return;
00642         }
00643 
00644         list[node->index] = 1;
00645         zdd_print_minterm_aux(zdd, Nv, level + 1, list);
00646         list[node->index] = 0;
00647         zdd_print_minterm_aux(zdd, Nnv, level + 1, list);
00648     }
00649     return;
00650 
00651 } /* end of zdd_print_minterm_aux */
